page.topic: Displaying Selected Lookup Table Records (Filtered Lookups)
page.description: If you want to be able to choose from a subset of lookup table records, you can build a filter expression. Records that do not satisfy the filter do not appear in the lookup window.

section.note: The CustomerType variable must be defined as a Session variable as Part of the Order table structure. To define the variable, click Table Structure and then select Table > Global Variables. If you do not define the variable as a Session variable, you will not be able to specify the Filter expression shown below.

section.title: Specifying That You Can Add Entries to the Table or Edit Existing Entries
section.description: If you want to be able to add records to a lookup table directly from the lookup window, check the User can add entries to table check box.If you want to be able to change records in a lookup table directly from the lookup window, check the User can edit existing entries check box.
